name: openclaw-admin-suite
description: Enterprise-grade Admin Panel for OpenClaw AI Agent Framework - React + Cloudflare Workers

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run copy-dist
scripts.copy-dist: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); const src='frontend/dist',dst='dist'; if(!fs.existsSync(dst))fs.mkdirSync(dst,{recursive:true}); fs.cpSync(src,dst,{recursive:true,force:true}); console.log('Copied frontend/dist to dist/');"
